00028 
00029 static inline int normal_getattr(HybfsData *data, const char *path,
00030                                  struct stat *stbuf)
00031 {
00032         std::string *p;
00033         int brid;
00034         int res = 0;
00035 
00036         p = resolve_path(data, path+strlen(REAL_DIR), &brid);
00037         if (p==NULL)
00038                 return -ENOMEM;
00039 
00040         DBG_PRINT("my path is %s\n", p->c_str());
00041 
00042         res = lstat(p->c_str(), stbuf);
00043         if (res)
00044                 res = -errno;
00045         delete p;
00046 
00047         return res;
00048 }
00049 
00050 int hybfs_getattr(const char *path, struct stat *stbuf)
00051 {
00052         int res, nq;
00053         int brid;
00054         std::string *p;
00055         std::string first, last;
00056         PathCrawler *pc= NULL;
00057 
00058         HybfsData *hybfs_core = get_data();
00059 
00060         assert(hybfs_core);
00061         assert(path);
00062         assert(stbuf);
00063 
00064         DBG_SHOWFC();
00065         DBG_PRINT("path: %s\n", path);
00066 
00067         res = 0;
00068         memset(stbuf, 0, sizeof(struct stat));
00069         
00070         if (strcmp(path, "/") == 0 || strcmp(path+1, REAL_DIR) == 0) {
00071                 /* this is expensive */
00072                 stbuf->st_mode = S_IFDIR | 0755;
00073                 stbuf->st_nlink = 2 + hybfs_core->get_nlinks();
00074                 stbuf->st_uid = geteuid();
00075                 stbuf->st_gid = getegid();
00076 
00077                 return 0;
00078         }
00079 
00080         pc = new PathCrawler(path);
00081         nq = pc->break_queries();
00082         
00083         /* no queries in this path, that means is the real one */
00084         if (nq == 0 && strncmp(path+1, REAL_DIR, strlen(REAL_DIR)-1) == 0){
00085                 res = normal_getattr(hybfs_core, path, stbuf);
00086                 
00087                 goto out;
00088         }
00089 
00090         first = pc->get_first_path();
00091         last = pc->get_rel_path();
00092         if(first.length() == 0 && last.length() == 0) {
00093         /* a query is treated like a virtual directory */
00094                 stbuf->st_mode = S_IFDIR | 0755;
00095                 stbuf->st_nlink = 2;
00096                 res = 0;
00097                 goto out;
00098                 
00099         }
00100         /* if we have a path, but the real root dir is not specified, than is an error */
00101         if(first.length() > 0 && !pc->is_real()) {
00102                 res = -ENOENT;
00103                 goto out;
00104         }
00105         /* try to do a merge between the first and the last component */
00106         first.append(last);
00107         if(first.find(REAL_DIR) == 1)
00108                 first.erase(1,strlen(REAL_DIR));
00109         /* now, get a stat on the absolute path */
00110         p = resolve_path(hybfs_core, first.c_str(), &brid);
00111         if(p == NULL) {
00112                 res = -ENOMEM;
00113                 goto out;
00114         }
00115         res = lstat(p->c_str(), stbuf);
00116         delete p;
00117         
00118 out:
00119         delete pc;
00120 
00121         return res;
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 int hybfs_access(const char *path, int mask)
00126 {
00127         int res, path_len;
00128         int flags, brid;
00129         std::string *p;
00130         
00131         HybfsData *hybfs_core = get_data();
00132         
00133         DBG_SHOWFC();
00134         
00135         if (strcmp(path, "/") == 0)
00136                 return 0;
00137 
00138         /* hack */
00139         path_len = strlen(path) -1;
00140         if (path_len == (strlen(REAL_DIR) - 1) && strncmp(path, REAL_DIR,
00141                         path_len))
00142                 return 0;
00143         if (strcmp(path+1, REAL_DIR) == 0)
00144                 return 0;
00145 
00146         /* TODO: this is to verify if the query expressed by path is valid */
00147         
00148         flags = HAS_PATH;
00149         try {
00150         if (flags & HAS_PATH) {
00151                 /* if it's a normal path, not a query, then verify the real source*/
00152                 p = resolve_path(hybfs_core, path+path_len+1, &brid);
00153                 if(p==NULL)
00154                         throw std::bad_alloc();
00155                 
00156                 res = access(p->c_str(), mask);
00157                 delete p;
00158         }
00159         }
00160         catch (std::exception) {
00161                 PRINT_ERROR("Hybfs Internal error in func %s line %d\n",
00162                                 __func__,__LINE__);
00163                 return -EIO;
00164         }
00165         
00166         if (res == -1)
00167                 return -errno;
00168 
00169         return 0;
00170 }
